name: The Red Carpet - An Advent Reflection
description:
For a little over a dollar a week, this reflection includes a full length reflection on Advent for each Sunday along with a short Scripture, prayer, and activity for each day that will allow the reader to roll out the Red Carpet of their heart for the birth of Christ at Christmas. This is a PDF and the purchaser is free to copy and distribute as they see fit. If you do copy and distribute, please give the author credit and consider making a donation, however that is not required. On payment, the PDF will be emailed from todd@thesainthoodproject.com by the end of the day.

Give yourself the Christmas present of accepting Christ in a deeper way.
